com.aloqa.trax.shared.positiontrack
Class ZoneJob

java.lang.Object
  com.aloqa.trax.shared.positiontrack.PositionUpdateJob
      com.aloqa.trax.shared.positiontrack.DistanceToUpdateEstimator
          com.aloqa.trax.shared.positiontrack.ZoneJob
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.aloqa.trax.shared.io.Serialisable
public class ZoneJob
extends com.aloqa.trax.shared.positiontrack.DistanceToUpdateEstimator

This class represents a zone-based update strategy for position information. Each time the target enters or leaves the specified zone, a PositionUpdate is generated. Whether PositionUpdates are triggered only once or several times can also be determined.

Field Summary
static byte MODE_ENTER
          In this mode, PositionUpdates are only reported when the specified ZoneTrigger reports that the target has entered the zone.
static byte MODE_ENTER_LEAVE
          In this mode, PositionUpdates are reported when the specified ZoneTrigger reports that the target has either entered or left the zone.
static byte MODE_LEAVE
          In this mode, PositionUpdates are only reported when the specified ZoneTrigger reports that the target has left the zone.
static byte TRIGGER_POLICY_MULTIPLE_PUs
          Determines that a ZoneJob can generate multiple PositionUpdates over time.
static byte TRIGGER_POLICY_SINGLE_PU
          Determines that a ZoneJob will generate at most one PositionUpdate.

ZoneJob()

public static final byte MODE_ENTER
In this mode, PositionUpdates are only reported when the specified ZoneTrigger reports that the target has entered the zone.

MODE_ENTER_LEAVE

public static final byte MODE_ENTER_LEAVE
In this mode, PositionUpdates are reported when the specified ZoneTrigger reports that the target has either entered or left the zone.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

MODE_LEAVE

public static final byte MODE_LEAVE
In this mode, PositionUpdates are only reported when the specified ZoneTrigger reports that the target has left the zone.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

TRIGGER_POLICY_MULTIPLE_PUs

public static final byte TRIGGER_POLICY_MULTIPLE_PUs
Determines that a ZoneJob can generate multiple PositionUpdates over time. This is the default value for a ZoneJob.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

TRIGGER_POLICY_SINGLE_PU

public static final byte TRIGGER_POLICY_SINGLE_PU
Determines that a ZoneJob will generate at most one PositionUpdate.

See Also:

Method Detail

getMode

public byte getMode()
Gets the mode of position reporting of this ZoneJob.

Returns:
The mode of position reporting of this ZoneJob, cp. MODE_ENTER, MODE_LEAVE, and MODE_ENTER_LEAVE.

getTriggerPolicy

public byte getTriggerPolicy()
Gets the trigger policy of this ZoneJob, cp. TRIGGER_POLICY_MULTIPLE_PUs and TRIGGER_POLICY_SINGLE_PU. By default, the trigger policy of a ZoneJob is set to TRIGGER_POLICY_MULTIPLE_PUs.

Returns:
The trigger policy of this ZoneJob.

getZoneTrigger

public CircularZoneTrigger getZoneTrigger()
Gets the ZoneTrigger associated with this ZoneJob.

Returns:
The ZoneTrigger associated with this ZoneJob.
